title: Apps won't open. Some of my apps won't open. When I click on them they appear to open but don't
content: When I click on apps they appear to start to open but don't. This is happening with more apps all the time. This ranges from ESPN fantasy to Chrome. Medium and the Guardian and my banking app. I've restarted. I also uninstalled and reinstalled one of them. It worked for a little while and then stopped opening.
